summary: Frontend refactoring verification for University.jsx and Adam.jsx - All features working correctly. Both components successfully refactored from monolithic files into modular structures.
critical_code_review_comments: University.jsx refactored from 1196 to 439 lines - well structured with 12 modular components
Adam.jsx refactored from 1319 to 430 lines - well structured with 10 modular components
Both index.js files properly export all components
Props are properly passed down to child components
State management remains in parent components (University.jsx, Adam.jsx)
Minor: useEffect dependency warnings in University.jsx (line 71) - not critical but could be improved
context_for_next_testing_agent: University and Adam components have been successfully refactored. All tabs and functionality verified working.

university_page_loads.details: University page loads at /university with header 'Care Claims University'

university_stats_banner.details: 4 metric cards displayed: Courses (4), Completed (0), In Progress (1), Certificates (0)

university_courses_tab.details: Courses tab shows course cards with images, titles, descriptions, lesson counts, progress bars, and 'Start Course' links

university_articles_tab.details: Articles tab shows article cards with search functionality

university_videos_tab.details: Videos tab shows Video Playlists and Training Videos sections

university_certificates_tab.details: My Certificates tab shows 'No Certificates Yet' empty state

university_firm_content_tab.details: Firm Content tab shows Custom Courses, Custom Articles, Documents sections with 'Add Content' button

adam_page_loads.details: Adam page loads at /adam with header 'Adam â€” QA Runner'

adam_dashboard_tab.details: Dashboard tab shows System Health Grid (5 components all operational), CQIL Metrics Cards (P0/P1/P2/Resolved), Quick Actions buttons

adam_centurion_tab.details: Centurion tab shows 'The Centurion' with API Scan, UI Crawl, Auto-Fix buttons, metrics, Frontend Routes, API Endpoints

adam_tests_tab.details: Tests tab shows Test Configuration with dropdown and 'Run Tests' button, 'Ready to Test' state

adam_reports_tab.details: Reports tab shows Break Reports with 6 reports listed

adam_quick_actions.details: All 4 Quick Actions buttons present and functional: Run Full Test Suite, Refresh Health Data, View Break Reports, Run Centurion Scan

university_components: UniversityHeader.jsx - Header with editable university name
CoursesTab.jsx - Course cards with category filter
